attributes.action: Classify Pedophilia as a mental disorder rather than a crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When children are sexually abused it is a well known fact that some become abusers themselves. In which case if one man abuses 10 children and even if only two of those children go on to become abusers the amount of pedophiles in the next generation will double. I propose that instead of a prison sentence they are sent to a mental health clinic until  given a  psychiatric review declaring they are able to be reintegrated into society without the risk of harm to themselves or any one around them; just like any other mental illness.
